parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Camera Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Destroy [[Post process effects]] given by handle or array of handles.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''ppEffectDestroy''' effect

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> effect: [[Number]] - effect handle

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> '''ppEffectDestroy''' [effect1,...]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> [effect1,...]: [[Array]] - array of effect handles -

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> effect1: [[Number]] - effect handle

</value></part><part><name> r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[ppEffectDestroy]] _hndl;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[ppEffectDestroy]] [_hndl0, _hndl1, _hndl2];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Post process effects]], [[ppEffectForceInNVG]], [[ppEffectEnable]], [[ppEffectEnabled]], [[ppEffectCreate]], [[ppEffectCommit]], [[ppEffectCommitted]], [[ppEffectAdjust]]
</value></part></template>
